talk.abstract: SchoolTool is an FOSS student information system developed in Python using the Zope 3 framework. It has several basic components a teacher could use: gradebook, attendance, calendars, etc and some "advanced" ones like interventions and skill tracking. It's easily available in the Ubuntu Linux distribution.
